ygData.subject: Re: Off Topic: King Ak'anon
ygData.msgSnippet: There s guy in Surefall Glade that will combine them for to make a whole staff if you take him the bottom part and the top part.... it was available to me as a
ygData.messageBody:
There's guy in Surefall Glade that will combine them for to make a whole
staff if you take him the bottom part and the top part.... it was available
to me as a Druid, but I don't know if it works for other classes.

-----Original Message-----
From: James Leavings [mailto:argynt@...]
Sent: Monday, June 21, 1999 3:32 AM
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Off Topic: King Ak'anon


From: "James Leavings" <argynt@...>

The staff segments are part of what I think is an unfinished
druid/ranger quest. I am not sure what they turn into.
Argynte
